name: Pocket Skate
description:
Tear it up and test your skills in this awesome arcade style skating game!

Pocket Skate is a fun skateboarding game packed with rad tricks, intuitive controls, and cool characters that fit in your pocket!

Gnarly features include -
* Awesome grinds, grabs and flip tricks to unlock
* Skate to your own tunes
* Pocket size levels for maximum fun
* 10 rad Skaters to unlock
* Customise your Skater’s look
* Snap a selfie and share it
* Intuitive gameplay and challenges to unlock more
* Easy to learn
* Game Centre Leaderboards
* No Ads
* Achieve Achievements!

New Skaters, levels and features coming soon.

Made in Melbourne by an indie game developer.
Hey! Why are you even reading this? You’re wasting precious skating time!
